EmailTemplate.subject: Case Number {!Case.CaseNumber} - “{!Case.Subject}” - notification that case has been received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We have received your email and Case Number “Email Subject” has been created and assigned to our Sales and Customer support team. Please save your Case Number for reference.
We strive to get back to our customers within 24 hours if your request is received on a weekday. In case you have sent the request on a weekend or during a public holiday, we will try our best to respond by the first working day.
If you wish to add additional information to your request, or wish to follow up, please reply to this email and leave the subject line unchanged.
Thank You
Sales and Customer Support Team
Cargill Aqua Nutrition North America
{!Case.Thread_Id}
